source.rawquery: PREFIX geos: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#> PREFIX lgdo: <http://linkedgeodata.org/ontology/> PREFIX bifi: <http://www.openlinksw.com/schema/sparql/extensions#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?x ?geoloc FROM <http://www.sdi4apps.eu/poi.rdf> WHERE {?x geos:asWKT ?geoloc . }

target.rawquery: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX ramon: <http://rdfdata.eionet.europa.eu/ramon/ontology/> PREFIX ngeo: <http://geovocab.org/geometry#> PREFIX wgeo: <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#> PREFIX nuts: <http://nuts.geovocab.org/> SELECT ?s ?label ?geoType(concat("POLYGON((",group_concat(concat(?long," ",?lat) ; separator = ","),"))") AS ?geoasWKT) FROM <http://nuts.geovocab.org/> WHERE { ?s a ramon:NUTSRegion . ?s rdfs:label ?label . ?s ngeo:geometry ?geom . ?geom a ?geoType . ?geom ngeo:exterior ?ext . ?ext a ?extType . ?ext ngeo:posList ?posList . ?posList (rdf:rest|rdf:first)* ?point . ?point wgeo:long ?long . ?point wgeo:lat ?lat . } group by ?s ?label ?geoType
